Did I improve at my game in the process? Also no. Is it a story about ‚Äúthe journey rather than the destination‚Äù? Not really. Did I at least have fun in the process? Not so sure. This is the story of me trying to be unconventional at probably the most studied game in existence and using my software engineering background for something that probably doesn‚Äôt need it.
